sqlMap.statement:
SELECT smu.ROW_ID row_id,smu.USER_CODE user_code,smu.USER_NAME user_name,smu.ATTR_FLAG attr_flag,smu.COMPANY_ID company_id,smu.DIVISION_ID division_id,smu.PERSON_ID person_id,smu.PASSWORD password,smu.CERT_YN cert_yn,smu.CERT_SERIALNO cert_serialno,smu.EMAIL email,smu.MOBILE mobile,smu.CONTACT_PHONE contact_phone,smu.FAX fax,smu.INURE_DATE inure_date,smu.ABATE_DATE abate_date,smu.USING_FLAG using_flag,smu.CREATE_DATE create_date,smu.REMARK remark FROM SM_USER smu WHERE smu.deleted_flag = '0'
SMU.COMPANY_ID = #company_id#
SMU.USER_CODE like '%$user_code$%'
SMU.USING_FLAG = #using_flag#
SMU.USER_NAME like '%$user_name$%'
SMU.INURE_DATE >= #inure_date#
ORDER BY smu.USER_CODE

SELECT smu.ROW_ID row_id,smu.USER_CODE user_code,smu.USER_NAME user_name,smu.ATTR_FLAG attr_flag,smu.COMPANY_ID company_id,smu.DIVISION_ID division_id,smu.PERSON_ID person_id,smu.PASSWORD password,smu.CERT_YN cert_yn,smu.CERT_SERIALNO cert_serialno,smu.EMAIL email,smu.MOBILE mobile,smu.CONTACT_PHONE contact_phone,smu.FAX fax,smu.INURE_DATE inure_date,smu.ABATE_DATE abate_date,smu.USING_FLAG using_flag,smu.CREATE_DATE create_date,smu.REMARK remark FROM SM_USER smu WHERE 1=1 and smu.deleted_flag = '0'
row_id in(#row_id#) and using_flag = '1' and using_flag is not null

SELECT smu.ROW_ID row_id,smu.USER_CODE user_code,smu.USER_NAME user_name,smu.ATTR_FLAG attr_flag,smu.COMPANY_ID company_id,smu.DIVISION_ID division_id,smu.PERSON_ID person_id,smu.PASSWORD password,smu.CERT_YN cert_yn,smu.CERT_SERIALNO cert_serialno,smu.EMAIL email,smu.MOBILE mobile,smu.CONTACT_PHONE contact_phone,smu.FAX fax,smu.INURE_DATE inure_date,smu.ABATE_DATE abate_date,smu.USING_FLAG using_flag,smu.CREATE_DATE create_date,smu.REMARK remark FROM SM_USER smu WHERE 1=1 and smu.deleted_flag = '0'
USER_CODE = #user_code#
ROW_ID<>#row_id#

SELECT smu.ROW_ID row_id,smu.USER_CODE user_code,smu.USER_NAME user_name,smu.ATTR_FLAG attr_flag,smu.COMPANY_ID company_id,smu.DIVISION_ID division_id,smu.PERSON_ID person_id,smu.PASSWORD password,smu.CERT_YN cert_yn,smu.CERT_SERIALNO cert_serialno,smu.EMAIL email,smu.MOBILE mobile,smu.CONTACT_PHONE contact_phone,smu.FAX fax,smu.INURE_DATE inure_date,smu.ABATE_DATE abate_date,smu.USING_FLAG using_flag,smu.CREATE_DATE create_date,smu.REMARK remark FROM SM_USER smu WHERE 1=1 and smu.deleted_flag = '0'
USER_NAME = #user_name#
ROW_ID<>#row_id#

SELECT smu.ROW_ID row_id,smu.USER_CODE user_code,smu.USER_NAME user_name,smu.ATTR_FLAG attr_flag,smu.COMPANY_ID company_id,smu.DIVISION_ID division_id,smu.PERSON_ID person_id,smu.PASSWORD password,smu.CERT_YN cert_yn,smu.CERT_SERIALNO cert_serialno,smu.EMAIL email,smu.MOBILE mobile,smu.CONTACT_PHONE contact_phone,smu.FAX fax,smu.INURE_DATE inure_date,smu.ABATE_DATE abate_date,smu.USING_FLAG using_flag,smu.CREATE_DATE create_date,smu.REMARK remark ,s1.company_name,s2.dept_name,s3.employee_name FROM SM_USER smu LEFT JOIN MD_COMPANY s1 ON smu.company_id = s1.row_id LEFT JOIN MD_DEPT s2 ON smu.division_id = s2.row_id LEFT JOIN MD_EMPLOYEE s3 ON smu.person_id = s3.row_id WHERE 1=1 and smu.deleted_flag = '0' AND smu.ROW_ID=#value#
